text: The secession of Mindanao in the southern Philippines, is proposed to split the country, making the second state island in the archipelago, to under by the former 16th president, Rodrigo Duterte since February 2024. Particularly also in Davao City.https://www.abs-cbn.com/news/2024/2/3/analyst-dismayed- over-duterte-s-call-for-mindanao-secession-1700 ==Reference== Category:Politics of the Philippines
title: Secession in the Philippines
